channel.title: Projects on Andre Meyer - Electronic Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Andre Meyer - Electronic Engineer

item.title: Adaino
item.description: I am a core developer of Adaino, an open source Analog Data Acquisition library for Arduino. It simplifies reading analog inputs at any sampling rate and cares about the proper acquisition thereof.

item.title: Smart Machine Vision Camera
item.description: Intelligent cameras not only record images, but also process them to recognize important image information themselves.

item.title: X-Ray Detector
item.description: Using X-ray sensors, images can be taken from inside a person or object without opening it.

item.title: Speaker Processor
item.description: The digital speaker processor is a versatile system-on-chip design optimized for digital audio processing in modern technology gadgets.
